title: Topic 001 Question 159
body: You discovered that sensitive personally identifiable information (PII) is being ingested to your Google Cloud environment in the daily ETL process from an on- premises environment to your BigQuery datasets. You need to redact this data to obfuscate the PII, but need to re-identify it for data analytics purposes. Which components should you use in your solution? (Choose two.)
options: Cloud Data Loss Prevention with cryptographic hashing
Cloud Data Loss Prevention with automatic text redaction
Cloud Data Loss Prevention with deterministic encryption using AES-SIV
